title: Ethereum network difficulty dropped around 20%!
text: You might have noticed a nice bump in your ETH profits estimation, that's because the Ethereum network difficulty just dropped around 20%. Happy mining!

title: Please, rate this app!
text: If you're feeling generous with your time, please support me by leaving a nice review in the App Store. As an independent developer, it means the world to me. Thank you!

title: What's new in version 1.6.0
text:
Huge update incoming!
* Awesome new icon!
* New Farm Widgets! View all of you miners most important stats in a single widget!
* Total power cost, net profits and ROI now available for your farms
* Total unpaid balance for farms
* Quick access to your miner's wallet in the Miner Detail Screen
* Bug fixes and performance improvements
Thanks for choosing Hashrate!
